overview: A Drama Documentary film about one of the most famous Christian saints. Saint George born in Lydda, Roman Palestine, was a soldier in the Roman army and was later venerated as a Christian martyr. Produced by The Coptic Orthodox Church in Egypt. Opening speech by former Coptic Pope Shenouda III, thanking the cast team , director and producer. Main producer is St. George church in Heliopolice Cairo - Directed by Samir Seif.
tagline: The Prince Of Martyrdom and The Saint Of All Ages
title: St.George
